subject: Baseball
Umpires
lead_paragraph: Some newspapers reported last Friday that veteran umpire Bruce Froemming was retiring at the end of the season. But neither M.L.B. nor Froemming made such an announcement.
snippet: Some newspapers reported last Friday that veteran umpire Bruce Froemming was retiring at the end of the season. But neither M.L.B. nor Froemming made such an announcement.
